socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that can chill enemies or create chilling areas.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 54% increased Effect of Chill on Enemies

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell will track how much mana you spend on it, granting a buff when the total mana spent reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, mines or skills with a reservation.
explicitMods:
Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 32 Mana on
Upfront Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill

Arcane Surge grants 13% increased Cast Speed
Arcane Surge grants 39% increased Mana Regeneration rate

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy blast explodes around the caster, dealing cold damage to enemies, and leaving behind a whirling vortex which deals cold damage over time and chills enemies caught in it. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will explode from a number of those projectiles instead, destroying them.

Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
20% less Area of Effect when Cast on Frostbolt
Can explode from up to 5 Frostbolt Projectiles

Give of your cold resolve.
You will be repaid.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, triggering linked spells. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.

Can be Detached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.

hybrid.secDescrText: Applies a buff that raises your armour, and takes some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Each second, the skill deals reflected damage to surrounding enemies based on the damage taken by the buff in that second. When the buff is removed, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken by the buff. You cannot have the buff at the same time as any other Guard skill.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
